#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int n,x[100005],y[100005],s,e,flag=0,i;
        scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&s,&e,&n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld%lld",&x[i],&y[i]);
            if((x[i]>=s&&x[i]<e))

               flag=1;

            if((y[i]<=e&&y[i]>s))
               {flag=1;}

        }
        if(flag==0)printf("YES\n");
        else
            printf("NO\n");
    }
}
